item.description:
Guard Up Open House Week/b]

Sunday, February 1-February 8, 2009
Join Guard Up for a Special Open House. Visitors ages 6 & up are invited to join a class or two for one week only. These classes will be opened for participation the week of February 1 - 8.

All classes other than ACE will require a 1/2 hour intro for contact participation.

Previous swordsmanship experience is not required. We provide the padded weapons (and spell packets). This is a family event with adults, teens and kids (ages 6+). If not in costume, Sweats and T-shirts are suggested. No shorts or tanktops allowed. Under 18 must have signed waiver by parents. 18 and over must have their own signed waiver. Waivers can be downloaded here: Waiver

Event Fee: The classes are FREE. Finale Event on Sunday, February 8th cost is $10/person if you bring a nonmember friend with you. ($45 if you are alone or with a member.)

NOTE: Go to http://www.guardup.co... for the list of classes available for you to particiapate in. Please call (781) 270-4800 to reserve your space.

Make sure to be ontime for required safety instruction at start of event.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the front desk... they can help you!
item.name: Guard Up! Family Swordsmanship Open House Week
